Row.Text: Sphere of Influence

Demand a Sphere of Influence over a City-State. If successful, the proposing player becomes the permanent Ally of the City-State (unless this Proposal is repealed). The proposer must be the current ally of the City-State.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Steam Power.
Open Door

Enact an Open Door policy for a City-State. If successful, all civilizations will immediately have their [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence set at 40 with the City-State, and no one can become the City-State's Ally until this Proposal is repealed.
Choose a City-State for the resolution to affect
Decolonization

Enforce global decolonization. If successful, the [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence of all Players with all City-States is lowered to 50, unless they are permanent allies.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Radio.
Casus Belli

The world recognizes the need for justifiable war to resolve diplomatic disputes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While this resolution is active, unit maintenance costs are lowered by 15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold. 0.5x [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger penalties for capturing cities and declaring war, and 2x [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger scores decay.
Travel Ban
Restricts international travel between Civilizations. Reduces the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism modifier for all Civilizations by 35%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Flight.
Passport System
Increases international travel between Civilizations. Increases the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism modifier for all Civilizations by 50%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Flight.
Cold War

Ideological differences have pushed the world into a cold war, and economic and political factions are forming based on ideology alone.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While this resolution is active, players may only make [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes with civilizations that follow the same ideology, or with allied City-States. Furthermore, [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence levels with allied City-States do not decline.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Atomic Theory.
Spaceflight Regulations

Spaceflight Regulations control the proliferation of modern ballistic technology, oversee national space programs, and limit the advance of pontentially-dangerous technology.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As long as this resolution is active, all players will suffer a global -25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production penalty for [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Parts and +25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold purchase costs for [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Parts.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Atomic Theory.
Global Liberation
All Master-Vassal relationships are immediately and peacefully annulled.
Treasure Fleet

Begins the Treasure Fleet project. Once underway, Civilizations can contribute [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards its completion by selecting it in the city production list. When complete, Civilizations receive bonuses based on how much they contributed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_GOLD]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_TREASURE_FLEET_3_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_SILVER]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_TREASURE_FLEET_2_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_BRONZE]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_TREASURE_FLEET_1_HELP}
Global Wargames

Begins the Global Wargames project. Once underway, Civilizations can contribute [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards its completion by selecting it in the city production list. When complete, Civilizations receive bonuses based on how much they contributed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_GOLD]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_WARGAMES_3_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_SILVER]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_WARGAMES_2_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_BRONZE]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_WARGAMES_1_HELP}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Replaceable Parts.
United Nations

Begins the United Nations project. Once underway, Civilizations can contribute [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards its completion by selecting it in the city production list. When complete, Civilizations receive bonuses based on how much they contributed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_GOLD]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_UNITED_NATIONS_3_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_SILVER]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_UNITED_NATIONS_2_HELP}[NEWLINE][ICON_TROPHY_BRONZE]: {TXT_KEY_LEAGUE_PROJECT_REWARD_UNITED_NATIONS_1_HELP}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Available once any Civilization discovers Atomic Theory.
